name: figma.wtf
description:
welcome to figma.wtf — a gallery of figma glitches i find and collect!


it’s extremely hard to ensure such a complicated piece of software works the same on countless different devices. bugs and glitches are inevitable. visual glitches especially for the graphics creation tool. that’s what i find fun and interesting!


some examples presented in this file were created by me, some were found in figma-related communities all over the web.


share link: https://figma.wtf

retweet: https://twitter.com/zyumbik/status/1278329662666661890
